main event: An oval, white light with flashing lights was observed at Minot AFB, North Dakota. It gained altitude and disappeared in 3 minutes with no sound or trail. The object was categorized as unidentified.
interesting points: The oval, white light was smaller than a dime and light green in color.
It later broke up into three separate objects, with one of them speeding away faster than the other two.
There was no tail, trail, or exhaust, and no sound was heard during the observation.
The altitude of the object ranged from 22,000 to 40,000 feet, and it covered a horizontal distance of 15 miles.
The primary witness, Lt. Stephen Piceposi, did not provide any comments.
sighted object: oval, white light with flashing lights
